Factsheet

Developer:
Evil Guinea Pig
Based in Mar del Plata, Buenos Aires, Argentina
Release date:
TBA
Platforms:
Steam
Website:
Steam page

Description

KVLT is an episodic Retro Shooter set in a obscure and grim version of WW2. KVLT is brutal and visceral, like your favorite 90's shooters, with a deep focus on level exploration and fast paced combat.

Story

The year is 1945, the world is again devastated by the horrors of war, but a darker and more terrible evil lurks in the shadow: unknown forces from other planes of existence will be awakened. You are Lazar, an ancient slavic occultist who has survived for more than five hundred years thanks to the use of corrupt magic and arcane practices. The newly arised global conflict has become an annoying obstacle in your agenda, or maybe a perfect opportunity? Prepare to annihilate nazi and allied soldiers alike, and to erase from existance hordes of deranged cultists, religious zealots and eldritch monstrosities, as you try to complete your search for power while chaos roams rampant.

Features

  • ‣ Explore a grim and unique version of WW2
  • ‣ Fast paced combat
  • ‣ Wield forgotten weaponary from WW2 and ancient artifacts. Cast obscure Eldritch spells
  • ‣ Fight your way through armies of Nazis, Cultists, Religious Zealots and Eldritch Abominations
